name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. George REITZ, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. George REITZ, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 11th day of October, 2000, petitioner’s “Motion for Leave to Supplement Petition for Allowance of Appeal” and “Motion for Leave to Supplement Record by Offering Slip Opinion from a Pennsylvania Appellate Court Regarding Petitioner’s Unlawfully Enhanced Sentence” are granted, and the petition for allowance of appeal is denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: George J. Reitz, Jr. for petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
759 A.2d 912
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. George REITZ, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 11, 2000.
George J. Reitz, Jr. for petitioner.
